00046 #define NETWORK_KEY_LENGTH 16u
00047 
00049 #define N_INTERPAN_DEVICE_INFO_RECORD_MAX 5u
00050 
00051 /* ZigBee info */
00052 #define N_INTERPAN_ZIGBEE_INFO_LOGICAL_TYPE 0x03u
00053 #define N_INTERPAN_ZIGBEE_INFO_COORDINATOR  0x00u
00054 #define N_INTERPAN_ZIGBEE_INFO_ROUTER       0x01u
00055 #define N_INTERPAN_ZIGBEE_INFO_END_DEVICE   0x02u
00056 
00057 #define N_INTERPAN_ZIGBEE_INFO_RX_ON_IDLE   0x04u
00058 
00059 /* ZLL info */
00060 #define N_INTERPAN_ZLL_INFO_FACTORY_NEW                0x01u
00061 #define N_INTERPAN_ZLL_INFO_ADDRESS_ASSIGNMENT         0x02u
00062 #define N_INTERPAN_ZLL_INFO_TOUCHLINK_INITIATOR        0x10u
00063 #define N_INTERPAN_ZLL_INFO_TOUCHLINK_PRIORITY_REQUEST 0x20u
00064 #define N_INTERPAN_ZLL_INFO_PROFILE_INTEROP            0x80u
00065 
00066 /***************************************************************************************************
00067 * EXPORTED TYPES
00068 ***************************************************************************************************/
00069 
00070 typedef uint8_t NetworkKey_t[NETWORK_KEY_LENGTH];
00071 
00072 // make sure that the Inter-PAN payload structures are packed
00073 // ...assume that all compilers do support it
00074 #pragma pack(1)
00075 
00077 typedef struct N_InterPan_FrameControl_t
00078 {
00079     unsigned char type:2;
00080     unsigned char manufacturerSpecific:1;
00081     unsigned char direction:1;
00082     unsigned char disableDefaultResponse:1;
00083     unsigned char reserved:3;
00084 } N_InterPan_FrameControl_t;
00085 
00089 typedef struct N_InterPan_FrameHeader_t
00090 {
00091     N_InterPan_FrameControl_t  frameControl;
00092     //uint16_t manufacturerCode;  // May be added later, but this requires additional code to skip it when not needed
00093     uint8_t                    transactionSequenceNumber;
00094     uint8_t                    commandId;
00095 } N_InterPan_FrameHeader_t;
00096 
00100 typedef struct N_InterPan_FrameHeader_ManufacturerSpecific_t
00101 {
00102     N_InterPan_FrameControl_t  frameControl;
00103     uint16_t                   manufacturerCode;
00104     uint8_t                    transactionSequenceNumber;
00105     uint8_t                    commandId;
00106 } N_InterPan_FrameHeader_ManufacturerSpecific_t;
00107 
00109 typedef struct N_InterPan_DeviceInfo_t
00110 {
00111     N_Address_Extended_t       ieeeAddress;
00112     uint8_t                    endPoint;
00113     uint16_t                   profileId;
00114     uint16_t                   deviceId;
00115     uint8_t                    version;
00116     uint8_t                    groupIds;
00117     uint8_t                    sort;
00118 } N_InterPan_DeviceInfo_t;
00119 
00121 typedef struct N_InterPan_ScanRequest_t
00122 {
00123     N_InterPan_FrameHeader_t   header;
00124     uint32_t                   transactionId;
00125     uint8_t                    zigBeeInfo;
00126     uint8_t                    zllInfo;
00127 } N_InterPan_ScanRequest_t;
00128 
00130 typedef struct N_InterPan_ScanResponse_t
00131 {
00132     N_InterPan_FrameHeader_t   header;
00133     uint32_t                   transactionId;
00134     uint8_t                    touchlinkRssiCorrection;
00135     uint8_t                    zigBeeInfo;
00136     uint8_t                    zllInfo;
00137     uint16_t                   keyBitMask;
00138     uint32_t                   responseId;
00139     N_Address_ExtendedPanId_t  extendedPanId;
00140     uint8_t                    networkUpdateId;
00141     uint8_t                    channel;
00142     uint16_t                   panId;
00143     uint16_t                   networkAddress;
00144     uint8_t                    numberSubDevices;
00145     uint8_t                    totalGroupIds;
00146     // optional fields only present when numberSubDevices == 1
00147     uint8_t                    endPoint;
00148     uint16_t                   profileId;
00149     uint16_t                   deviceId;
00150     uint8_t                    version;
00151     uint8_t                    groupIds;
00152 } N_InterPan_ScanResponse_t;
00153 
00155 typedef struct N_InterPan_DeviceInfoRequest_t
00156 {
00157     N_InterPan_FrameHeader_t   header;
00158     uint32_t                   transactionId;
00159     uint8_t                    startIndex;
00160 } N_InterPan_DeviceInfoRequest_t;
00161 
00163 typedef struct N_InterPan_DeviceInfoResponse_t
00164 {
00165     N_InterPan_FrameHeader_t   header;
00166     uint32_t                   transactionId;
00167     uint8_t                    numberSubDevices;
00168     uint8_t                    startIndex;
00169     uint8_t                    count;
00170     N_InterPan_DeviceInfo_t    deviceInfo[N_INTERPAN_DEVICE_INFO_RECORD_MAX];
00171 } N_InterPan_DeviceInfoResponse_t;
00172 
00174 typedef struct N_InterPan_IdentifyRequest_t
00175 {
00176     N_InterPan_FrameHeader_t   header;
00177     uint32_t                   transactionId;
00178     uint16_t                   identifyTime;
00179 } N_InterPan_IdentifyRequest_t;
00180 
00182 typedef struct N_InterPan_NetworkStartRequest_t
00183 {
00184     N_InterPan_FrameHeader_t   header;
00185     uint32_t                   transactionId;
00186     N_Address_ExtendedPanId_t  extendedPanId;
00187     uint8_t                    keyIndex;
00188     NetworkKey_t               encryptedNetworkKey;
00189     uint8_t                    channel;
00190     uint16_t                   panId;
00191     uint16_t                   networkAddress;
00192     uint16_t                   groupIdsBegin;
00193     uint16_t                   groupIdsEnd;
00194     uint16_t                   freeNetworkAddressRangeBegin;
00195     uint16_t                   freeNetworkAddressRangeEnd;
00196     uint16_t                   freeGroupIdRangeBegin;
00197     uint16_t                   freeGroupIdRangeEnd;
00198     N_Address_Extended_t       endDeviceIeeeAddress;
00199     uint16_t                   endDeviceNetworkAddress;
00200 } N_InterPan_NetworkStartRequest_t;
00201 
00203 typedef struct N_InterPan_NetworkStartResponse_t
00204 {
00205     N_InterPan_FrameHeader_t   header;
00206     uint32_t                   transactionId;
00207     uint8_t                    status;
00208     N_Address_ExtendedPanId_t  extendedPanId;
00209     uint8_t                    networkUpdateId;
00210     uint8_t                    channel;
00211     uint16_t                   panId;
00212 } N_InterPan_NetworkStartResponse_t;
00213

00261 // back to the default packing
00262 // ...assume that all compilers do support it (only tested with visual studio)
00263 #pragma pack()
00264 
00266 typedef struct N_InterPan_Callback_t
00267 {
00269     void (*ReceivedScanRequest)(N_InterPan_ScanRequest_t* pPayload, int8_t rssi, N_Address_Extended_t* pSourceAddress);
00271     void (*ReceivedScanResponse)(N_InterPan_ScanResponse_t* pPayload, int8_t rssi, N_Address_Extended_t* pSourceAddress);
00273     void (*ReceivedDeviceInfoRequest)(N_InterPan_DeviceInfoRequest_t* pPayload, N_Address_Extended_t* pSourceAddress);
00275     void (*ReceivedDeviceInfoResponse)(N_InterPan_DeviceInfoResponse_t* pPayload, N_Address_Extended_t* pSourceAddress);
00277     void (*ReceivedIdentifyRequest)(N_InterPan_IdentifyRequest_t* pPayload, N_Address_Extended_t* pSourceAddress);
00279     void (*ReceivedNetworkStartRequest)(N_InterPan_NetworkStartRequest_t* pPayload, N_Address_Extended_t* pSourceAddress);
00281     void (*ReceivedNetworkStartResponse)(N_InterPan_NetworkStartResponse_t* pPayload, N_Address_Extended_t* pSourceAddress);
00283     void (*ReceivedNetworkJoinRouterRequest)(N_InterPan_NetworkJoinRequest_t* pPayload, N_Address_Extended_t* pSourceAddress);
00285     void (*ReceivedNetworkJoinRouterResponse)(N_InterPan_NetworkJoinResponse_t* pPayload, N_Address_Extended_t* pSourceAddress);
00287     void (*ReceivedNetworkJoinEndDeviceRequest)(N_InterPan_NetworkJoinRequest_t* pPayload, N_Address_Extended_t* pSourceAddress);
00289     void (*ReceivedNetworkJoinEndDeviceResponse)(N_InterPan_NetworkJoinResponse_t* pPayload, N_Address_Extended_t* pSourceAddress);
00291     void (*ReceivedNetworkUpdateRequest)(N_InterPan_NetworkUpdateRequest_t* pPayload, N_Address_Extended_t* pSourceAddress);
00293     void (*ReceivedResetToFactoryNewRequest)(N_InterPan_ResetToFactoryNewRequest_t* pPayload, N_Address_Extended_t* pSourceAddress);
00294 
00304     void (*ReceivedInterPanCommand)(uint16_t clusterId, uint16_t payloadLength, uint8_t* pPayload, int8_t rssi, N_Address_Extended_t* pSourceAddress);
00305 
00307     int8_t endOfList;
00308 } N_InterPan_Callback_t;
